quote: Ancient Rule of Twenty-one: if you do anything for twenty-one days in a row, it will be installed as a habit. – Robin Sharma
fact: To escape the grip of a crocodile`s jaws, push your thumbs into its eyeballs - it will let you go instantly.
joke: The shovel was a ground-breaking invention.
